quotes: Be you. Find you. Be happy with that.
Never let the mistakes of your past and the fear of your future ruin the happiness of your present.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
To be successful, the first thing to do is to fall in love with your work.
The difference between what you are and what you want to be is what you do.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success is simple. Do what’s right, the right way, at the right time.
The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Your work is discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven’t planted.
If you don’t design your own life plan, chances are you’ll fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners.
